snippet: The federal government will issue its official jobs report for September on Friday, with forecasts for a gain of 206,000 jobs.
abstract: ADP reports employers added 200,000 jobs in September, up from 180,000 in August;
lead_paragraph: The federal government will issue its official jobs report for September on Friday, with forecasts for a gain of 206,000 jobs.

headline.main: U.S. Businesses Add 200,000 Jobs, ADP Survey Shows
headline.print_headline: 200,000 Jobs Were Added Last Month, a Survey Says
